title: 1-3 second delay on every click / command
body: For some reason every single game today I have had <40 ping and 100+ fps yet half the time I click my champ to move somewhere , auto something. or cast an ability its literally delayed by up to 3 seconds. its practically like i have 3000ms even tho my ping is 40. My character will literally just stand there like an idiot while i get poked by my laner for free. its the most frustrating thing ive ever seen. I thought it would be fixed after the first game but it happened again. Then i restarted my router and played again and it still happened. Now ive played like 5 games in total and theyve all had this stupid delay lag. I also went into command prompt and pinged 8.8.8.8 and i got no packet loss, so yea idk what the problem is

replies.body:
Let's help pinpoint if this is an issue like packet loss or maybe a configuration corruption.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted game, and let me know you get through that tool.

If you get a good score, see if resetting your config might help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
I used the log reader and i got a 90+ score on all of the games i played today. I also did what you said but im still experiencing the delay

Hey, thanks for trying!  This is a strange case, hit us up directly in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you on this one.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and attach it to your ticket so we can get more context.  See you there!
Alright will do, thanks for trying to help =)
